snippet: Less than 24 hours before the candidates’ deadline to qualify for Fox News’s debate, polls by Fox News poll and by WMUR show Mr. Trump with a statistically significant lead over the rest of the field and Gov. John R. Kasich of Ohio squeaking into...
abstract: Less than 24 hours before the candidates’ deadline to qualify for Fox News’s debate, polls by Fox News poll and by WMUR show Mr. Trump with a statistically significant lead over the rest of the field and Gov. John R. Kasich of Ohio squeaking into the tenth and final spot.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and KATHARINE Q. SEELYE

headline.main: New Polls Show Donald Trump Widening His Lead and John Kasich Holding His Own
